titleInfo.title: Spectrophotometric determination of reaction stoichiometry and equilibrium constants of metallochromic indicators III. Antipyrylazo III complexing with Ca2+ and acetylcholine receptor protein

bibliographicCitation.chicago: Dorogi, Peter L., Moss, Karen, Neumann, Eberhard, and Chang, Hai Won. 1981. “Spectrophotometric determination of reaction stoichiometry and equilibrium constants of metallochromic indicators III.
